data.name: Heartbeat: Regret
data.detailed_description:
Heartbeat: Regret is a horror themed rhythm-typing game, which is divided into seven compact, gradually challenging levels that take the player on an atmospheric journey of discovery. The challenge rises from avoiding and outwitting a dark precense that roams the mansion in which the player gets trapped in.

Prepare to die, retry and die again until you release the soul of your ally from this cursed mansion in between worlds.

Type your way out of the mansion by interacting with your environment. Listen to the growls of the monster to avoid him and find a way out.

Move in rhythm with your heartbeat and don’t lose it or you’ll pass away!

The game is fully playable without visuals and has 3 colorblind modes to choose from.




Features
  • Fully accessible for visually impaired players
  • Short but challenging adventure
  • Rhythm training while having fun
  • Spooky environment provided
  • Neat sound design to spot where the monster is with audio

data.short_description: This short & challenging horror adventure will drive you nuts! Type your way out of this cursed mansion and avoid the regret monster by hiding, running and setting traps. But don’t lose the rhythm of your heartbeat or make typos, they may cause you a heart attack… Fully playable without visuals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard required, headphones recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: A horror themed game. Contains some blood and loud, startling sounds.
